skills.name: Leave It to Me!
skills.desc: Deals Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Trailblazer's ATK to one designated enemy.
skills.simpleDesc: Deals minor Ice DMG to one enemy.

skills.name: I Choose You!
skills.desc: Summons the memosprite Mem. If Mem is already on the field, restores Mem's HP by an amount equal to #1[i]% of Mem's Max HP, and grants Mem #2[i]% Charge.
skills.simpleDesc: Summons the memosprite Mem. If Mem is already on the field, restores Mem's HP, and grants Mem Charge.

skills.name: Together, Mem!
skills.desc: Summons memosprite Mem. Grants Mem #2[i]% Charge, then makes Mem deal Ice DMG equal to #1[i]% of Mem's ATK to all enemies.
skills.simpleDesc: Summons memosprite Mem. Grants Mem Charge, then makes Mem deal massive Ice DMG to all enemies.

skills.name: Almighty Companion
skills.desc: Memosprite Mem has an initial SPD of #1[i] and a Max HP equal to #2[i]% of Trailblazer's Max HP plus #4[i]. For every #3[i] Energy regenerated by all allies in total, Mem gains 1% Charge.
skills.simpleDesc: Every time a certain amount of Energy is regenerated by all allies, Mem gains Charge.

skills.name: Memories Back as Echoes
skills.desc:
After using Technique, creates a Special Dimension that lasts for #1[i] second(s). Enemies within the Special Dimension are placed in a Time Stop state, halting all their actions.
After entering battle against enemies afflicted with the Time Stop state, delays the action of all enemies by #2[i]%, and then deals Ice DMG to all enemies equal to #3[i]% of Trailblazer's ATK.
Only 1 Dimension Effect created by allies can exist at the same time.
skills.simpleDesc: Creates a Special Dimension. Enemies in the dimension cease actions. When entering battle against enemies in the dimension, delays the action of all enemies and deals minor Ice DMG to all enemies.

eidolons.name: Narrator of the Present
eidolons.desc: Increases the CRIT Rate of ally targets with "Mem's Support" by <nobr>10%</nobr>. When an ally target has "Mem's Support," the effect of "Mem's Support" also applies to the target's memosprite/memomaster. This effect cannot stack.

eidolons.name: Gleaner of the Past
eidolons.desc: When ally memosprites (aside from Mem) take action, Trailblazer regenerates <nobr>8</nobr> Energy. This effect can trigger a max of <nobr>1</nobr> time(s) per turn. The trigger count resets at the start of Trailblazer's turn.

eidolons.name: Chanter of the Future
eidolons.desc:
Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Memosprite Talent Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Dancer of the Muse
eidolons.desc: When an ally target with 0 Max Energy actively uses an ability, Mem can also gain <nobr>3%</nobr> Charge, and the multiplier of the True DMG dealt by this target via "Mem's Support" additionally increases by <nobr>6%</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Seamster of the Ode
eidolons.desc:
Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>15</nobr>.
Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.
Memosprite Skill Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <nobr>10</nobr>.

eidolons.name: Bearer of the Revelation
eidolons.desc: Ultimate's CRIT Rate is set at <nobr>100%</nobr>.

embedBonusSkill.name: Rhapsode's Scepter
embedBonusSkill.desc: When the battle starts, Trailblazer's <u>action advances</u> by <nobr>30%</nobr>. When Mem is first summoned, grants Mem <nobr>40%</nobr> Charge.

embedBonusSkill.name: Petite Parable
embedBonusSkill.desc: When using "Baddies! Trouble!," Mem immediately gains <nobr>5%</nobr> Charge.

embedBonusSkill.name: Magnets and Long Chains
embedBonusSkill.desc: When the Max Energy of an ally target that has "Mem's Support" exceeds <nobr>100</nobr>, for every <nobr>10</nobr> excess Energy, additionally increases the multiplier of the <u>True DMG</u> dealt via "Mem's Support" by <nobr>#3[f1]%</nobr>, up to a max increase of <nobr>20%</nobr>.
